Description: Round-topped limestone stela; representation of a dove; two lines of Coptic text from which the name has been erased.
Bibliographic references: Hall 1905 / Coptic and Greek Texts of the Christian Period from Ostraka, Stelae, etc. in the British Museum (p.142)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: I.Brit.Mus.Gr. I App:12 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
